message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product. Given its high value and significance to you, I propose a price of $13,500. This offer takes into account the worth of the product to both of us and aims to ensure a fair transaction. Please let me know if this proposal works for you.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to pay closer to $11,500. This is a fair price considering the value to both of us.  Let's see if we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. In light of this, I would like to counter with a price of $12,500. This offer aims to find a middle ground between our respective positions while still reflecting the product's true value to you. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're considering.
